name: The Cursèd Pickle of Shireton
description:
.oO Age of Aeons 2 Oo.

A NEW AEON AWAITS! Be among the first to experience Age of Aeons 2™ in our limited public beta release! Relive your favorite classic adventures, locations, and characters, then get ready to level up and traverse an entire new gameworld loaded with unique and original content! Battle alongside your online-friends, form a guild, and collect epic treasures waiting for you in a dangerous uncharted landscape inhabited by fearsome and deadly new opponents!  Will you be prepared for the Second Age? Age of Aeons 2™ wil̷l be̴̺̾̂͋ rea̵̛͖̓̑̈̀̎͝d̴̛̾͌̐̆y̶̧̠̦͈̟̱͔̲͖͔̥̼̳̫̋͒͘͜͝ ̶̨̢̹͚̳̖̮̳̟͛̈́̅̇͋̏̕͠fö̶̡̧̢̲̙̝̝͔̖́́͌ͅṙ̵̛͋̀́͌̐̈́̂̆͘͠ ̸͔͐̃͒̀ÿ̶̢̡̨̡̢̛̪͎̟̭͎̯̖̖̪̱̠̹͉̞͉̫̭̯͖̳͚̞̣̹̖͓̟́͆̑̑ơ̸̢̧̧̢̬̩̩͚͖̖̠̥̜̘̪͈̖͇̰̻̯̱̰̳̪͕̺̣͍̝̗͚͚̈́̀̾̏̔̏͋͒͊̇́͆͑̂̎́̋̋̓̅̚͠ų̶̧͙͙̬̲̣̠̱͍̤̖̙̻͔̙̣̺͓̦̗͓̜̥͉̖͓̻̗̳̜͚̺͚̱̪̳̟̗̩̬͈͐̌̆̅̀̅̃̅̃̿̋̊̉̓̐̐̀͘̕͠͝͝ͅ

  • Please be aware that original Age of Aeons characters, statistics, and inventory will be transferred over from the original Legacy Client upon full public release and you will need to create a new character from scratch for use during the beta-test. The Legacy Client is currently only available online, but not all gameplay features and areas may be enabled as we move resources to our new servers. We recommend logging in to the Legacy Client to export your Age of Mail messages and Thy Friendlist for backup during the transition.

Mouse/Pointing Device recommended. May not run optimally on mobile devices.

.oOo.

the CURSÈD PICKLE of SHIRETON

is an entry to the 2020 Interactive Fiction Competition.
